name: Synzzball
description:
The game
Navigate the ball through 50 challenging levels. Find the exits from the levels and collect coins and stars along the way. Use the coins to unlock cosmetic objects for the ball. Once all coins and stars have been collected in a level, you can upload your best times to a global leaderboard and compete with other players.

Movement
Move the ball with careful and precise accelerations.


Editor
The game includes an editor with which you can create your own level. Through the Steam Workshop integration, you can share your own levels with other players or try out created levels. Use the variety of available objects to create complex and challenging levels.
